G

Game - package Game
Contains all packages related to and required to run the Battleship game
GAME_OVER - Game.BattleshipMVC.Model.Enums.GameStatus
Game is in GAME_OVER status and the current game has ended
Game.BattleshipMVC - package Game.BattleshipMVC
This package contains all files to be able to run the MVC Battleship game
Game.BattleshipMVC.Controller - package Game.BattleshipMVC.Controller
Controller for the Battleship game.
Game.BattleshipMVC.Model - package Game.BattleshipMVC.Model
These classes contain the game's logic and manage it.
Game.BattleshipMVC.Model.Enums - package Game.BattleshipMVC.Model.Enums
Contains enums for the model
Game.BattleshipMVC.View - package Game.BattleshipMVC.View
These classes create and manage the UI for the Battleship game
Game.ClientServer - package Game.ClientServer
This package contains all logic for the frontend and backend elements for the Battleship client and server
Game.ClientServer.Client - package Game.ClientServer.Client
Contains all the frontend and backend logic for handling the Battleship client
Game.ClientServer.Server - package Game.ClientServer.Server
Contains all the frontend and backend logic for handling the Battleship server
Game.Util - package Game.Util
Contains constants and util methods that are used by other packages
